functions.name: ReadMessage
functions.logic: Reads a JSON message from the message pipe.  This likely involves reading from some underlying communication channel (e.g., a file descriptor, a socket).  The implementation details are hidden, but conceptually it deserializes a JSON value from the input stream.

functions.name: WriteMessage
functions.logic: Writes a JSON message to the message pipe. This likely involves serializing the given JSON value to a string and writing it to some underlying communication channel (e.g., a file descriptor, a socket). The implementation details are hidden, but conceptually it serializes a JSON value to an output stream.
